about_the_game:
SSR Wives: The Murder Of My Winter Crush Is an upcoming Retro Survival Horror experience that takes inspiration from iconic staples of the survival horror genre with the romantic and interpersonal intrigue of a Visual Novel. The game aims to create a tense, atmospheric, and immersive experience by combining a Haunting Mystery Narrative, Exploration, challenging puzzles, and terrifying enemy encounters.

CLASSIC SURVIVAL HORROR MECHANICS AND MORE...


  • -Dynamic Fixed camera system
  • -Classic Tank Controls
  • -Challenging Puzzles
  • -High-stakes Combat & Varied Enemy encounters
  • -Grid Inventory management
  • -Classic Door Scene Transitions
  • -Haunting Mystery Narrative & World
  • -Collectibles/Documents/Pickables
  • -Inspect the environment and make choices
  • -Retro Low-Poly Inspired Visual direction
  • -Romantic Interpersonal VN Intrigue
  • -Multi-ending Visual Novel experience
  • -Original Soundtrack Production:KORAII

    キャラクター CHARACTERS:




    The Town That Time Forgot inhabits a variety of residents. Inflicted with disorder and scattered around the town. Their respective areas a part of their identity, Dungeons hiding dark secrets, Sins in need of light.


    The player will encounter various characters with whom they can interact and build relationships. Players must make dialogue choices that impact their relationships and navigate through personal quests that reveal more about each character's backstory. As relationships deepen, The player can potentially find love, but the player must also balance their emotional connections with the need to survive...

    Combat


    Players will encounter a range of grotesque and horrifying enemies, each with unique strengths and weaknesses. Some easier to engage then others the player will have to decide whether to prioritize escape and evasion or directly confront the threats lurking in the dark...

    Classic Tank controls create restraint in combat... You do not want to miss your shots,for resources are scarce and consumable items are to be treasured. The Grid based inventory management system will reward organized players with plenty of room and stock to preserve the resources needed to survive until the next safe room.

    If you lack the resources to engage, evasion is always an option...

    WEAPONS

    The game starts out with a small modest arsenal of firearms & melee weapons to collect. But as the game progresses and the combat encounters become more difficult and varied the new arsenal should follow. Earning and seeking out these legendary weapons is optional in many cases. But ultimately rewarding to those who wish to venture into darker places they shouldn't stick around in...

    EXPLORATION/PUZZLES/CHOICES

    A wide variety of locales,dungeons and environments await In The Town That Time Forgot. Snowy forests, A Veterinary Clinic, An Abandoned Missile Silo, Liminal Labyrinths, An Antiquated Bakery And a Clown Carnival to name just a few... Aside from dangerous enemy encounters in these areas you will also find Classic Survival Horror puzzles in need of solutions. Interact with the environment, find keys to open locked rooms, collect documents to learn more about the world and its inhabitants.

    As you explore the environment you might also find situations where choices will be prompted. So be sure to interact with the entirety of an environment to find clues, discover secret items or engage in miscellaneous actions to affect the world like pushing objects, breaking containers or dialoguing with NPCs.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
